    • Method Detail

      • unRegisterGlobalAction

        public void unRegisterGlobalAction(ActionComponent action)
        Removes the given ActionComponent from the Frame and its FrameComponent (if one is attached). Thereafter the FrameComponent will be notified about this modification to be able to rebuild its MenuBar.
        Parameters:
        action -

      • registerGlobalAction

        public void registerGlobalAction(ActionComponent action)
        Adds a new ActionComponent to the Frame and its FrameComponent (if one is attached). Thereafter the FrameComponent will be notified about this modification to be able to rebuild its MenuBar.
        Parameters:
        action -

        public void doLayout()
        Description copied from interface: FrameTreeNode
